title: Neo Pax Sivir skin codes
body: Do the codes for the skin expire from pax when the skin is put into the vault?

replies.body: I believe the codes expire on the 9th, after which they will no longer be available for redemption.  If you have a code, be sure to unlock it asap!
It says on the back of the code cards that they expire on the 12th.

> [{quoted}](name=RavenHusky,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EEjc1W5f,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-09-06T21:14:06.619+0000)
>
> It says on the back of the code cards that they expire on the 12th.
Ohh, ty. I didnt see it

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EEjc1W5f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-06T17:24:05.843+0000)
>
> I believe the codes expire on the 9th, after which they will no longer be available for redemption.  If you have a code, be sure to unlock it asap!

Thanks!
